system.description: At 18th level you finally achieve a taste of the perfection you crave. You are proficient with all weapons, armor, and shields, and if you encounter a weapon you have never seen before (such as one from a level of technology different from your own), after a minute of practice, you are proficient with it. In addition, at the beginning of your turn, you may grant a weapon you are wielding one of the following properties until the beginning of your next turn: breaker, compounding, defensive (any), parrying, parrying immunity, thrown, vicious.
